trans-unit.source: The automation module can monitor changes to files and folders. Based on custom settings and associated file processing tasks, this module can automatically perform the corresponding actions.
trans-unit.target: The automation module can monitor changes to files and folders. Based on custom settings and associated file processing tasks, this module can automatically perform the corresponding actions.

trans-unit.source: Regularly execute according to the set time
trans-unit.target: Regularly execute according to the set time

trans-unit.source: Perform periodic execution according to the set plan
trans-unit.target: Perform periodic execution according to the set plan

trans-unit.source: Associate tasks with automatic execution methods. The selected tasks will appear on the right side and will be associated after saving
trans-unit.target: Associate tasks with automatic execution methods. The selected tasks will appear on the right side and will be associated after saving

trans-unit.source: EasyTidy can automatically process and organize files and folders. It can filter files by various conditions such as name and directory. Supports manual and automatic execution. You can set delay, time interval or customize the execution cycle with CRON expression for easy and efficient file management.
trans-unit.target: EasyTidy can automatically process and organize files and folders. It can filter files by various conditions such as name and directory. Supports manual and automatic execution. You can set delay, time interval or customize the execution cycle with CRON expression for easy and efficient file management.
trans-unit.note: EasyTidy can automatically process and organize files and folders. It can filter files by various conditions such as name and directory. Supports manual and automatic execution. You can set delay, time interval or customize the execution cycle with CRON expression for easy and efficient file management.

trans-unit.source: Select the theme that suits your mood and preference. You can choose from dark, light, or system themes.
trans-unit.target: Select the theme that suits your mood and preference. You can choose from dark, light, or system themes.

trans-unit.source: Sync your app’s color with your Windows accent color. You can open the Windows accent color setting by clicking this card.
trans-unit.target: Sync your app’s color with your Windows accent color. You can open the Windows accent color setting by clicking this card.

trans-unit.source: Easily add files that need to be filtered to achieve precise management of specific files. By adding file processing rules, you can customize the way files are processed to meet individual needs. At the same time, you can also use the powerful pattern matching function of regular expressions to further refine the filtering and processing logic of files, making file management more efficient and intelligent. Whether you want to exclude specific types of files or perform special processing on files that match specific patterns, you can easily do it here.
trans-unit.target: Easily add files that need to be filtered to achieve precise management of specific files. By adding file processing rules, you can customize the way files are processed to meet individual needs. At the same time, you can also use the powerful pattern matching function of regular expressions to further refine the filtering and processing logic of files, making file management more efficient and intelligent. Whether you want to exclude specific types of files or perform special processing on files that match specific patterns, you can easily do it here.

trans-unit.source: All words in a random order
trans-unit.target: All words in a random order

trans-unit.source: All words in arbitrary order (case sensitive)
trans-unit.target: All words in arbitrary order (case sensitive)

trans-unit.source: If the sizes are different, cover them
trans-unit.target: If the sizes are different, cover them

trans-unit.target: Please select a folder, the default is the desktop

trans-unit.target: Desktop shortcut to the destination folder

trans-unit.target: Support CRON expression, and CRON expression has higher priority than the values of the first five items

trans-unit.target: It will run when the time unit matches the value below.

trans-unit.target: Val1, Val2, ..., ValN Match Value List

trans-unit.source: Match values range from n1 to n2
trans-unit.target: Match values range from n1 to n2

trans-unit.source: n1-n2/n3 matches the range n1 to n2 for step n3
trans-unit.target: n1-n2/n3 matches the range n1 to n2 for step n3

trans-unit.source: Example: Minutes = 15 Hours = 03 Month = 3-10/3 Day of the week = 1,3,5 The tasks will run at 3:15 AM on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays in March, June, and September.
trans-unit.target: Example: Minutes = 15 Hours = 03 Month = 3-10/3 Day of the week = 1,3,5 The tasks will run at 3:15 AM on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays in March, June, and September.

trans-unit.target: Ignore irrelevant files or folders as well as system file folders

trans-unit.target: Minimize to the notification area on startup

trans-unit.source: If necessary, EasyTidy will automatically restart. Check the automatic backup to back up every time the software starts
trans-unit.target: If necessary, EasyTidy will automatically restart. Check the automatic backup to back up every time the software starts

trans-unit.source: Users can add file processing tasks and professionally configure the execution mode, including selecting automatic execution, one-time execution only, and creating desktop shortcuts and adding backup tasks.
trans-unit.target: Users can add file processing tasks and professionally configure the execution mode, including selecting automatic execution, one-time execution only, and creating desktop shortcuts and adding backup tasks.

trans-unit.target: Add files to a tidy task

trans-unit.target: Change the appearance of the backdrop material behind your app. You can choose from mica, acrylic, or transparent options.

trans-unit.target: Millisecond, represented by padding three digits.

trans-unit.target: <toast launch='meetingId=9813'> <visual> <binding template='ToastGeneric'> <text hint-maxLines='1'>EasyTidy has been started, please do not start it again</text> </binding> </visual> </toast>

trans-unit.source: Setting up your app and adjusting its operation parameters.
trans-unit.target: Setting up your app and adjusting its operation parameters.

trans-unit.source: EasyTidy is an open-source, professional file management tool designed to provide users with efficient and convenient file classification and organization solutions. Through custom settings, users can achieve various sorting methods such as automatic sorting, scheduled sorting, real-time sorting, and manual sorting to meet the file management needs in different scenarios. Used by the author ♥ make.
trans-unit.target: EasyTidy is an open-source, professional file management tool designed to provide users with efficient and convenient file classification and organization solutions. Through custom settings, users can achieve various sorting methods such as automatic sorting, scheduled sorting, real-time sorting, and manual sorting to meet the file management needs in different scenarios. Used by the author ♥ make.

trans-unit.source: Template Completion Instructions: 1. Task Group Name: Optional, if not filled in, defaults to the import file name plus the current date (e.g., if the import file name is 'Test Template', the group name will be 'Test Template 2025-06-12'). 2. Task Name: Required, the unique identifier for the task. 3. Processing Rule: Required, rules are consistent with individual additions. 4. Is Regular Expression: Optional, whether to process the rule as a regular expression, options are: Y/N. 5. Operation Type: Required, supports all rules available when adding a single task, and relates to the language set in the current application (e.g., if the application is set to English, fill in 'Move', etc.). 6. Source Path: Optional: The path to the source file(s) or folder(s) for the task. If left blank, the task can only be executed by dragging and dropping into the window or by using the right-click context menu. (Path format example: D:\db\test) 7. Target Path: Required, the target file/folder path for the task. (Path format: D:\db\test)
trans-unit.target: Template Completion Instructions: 1. Task Group Name: Optional, if not filled in, defaults to the import file name plus the current date (e.g., if the import file name is 'Test Template', the group name will be 'Test Template 2025-06-12'). 2. Task Name: Required, the unique identifier for the task. 3. Processing Rule: Required, rules are consistent with individual additions. 4. Is Regular Expression: Optional, whether to process the rule as a regular expression, options are: Y/N. 5. Operation Type: Required, supports all rules available when adding a single task, and relates to the language set in the current application (e.g., if the application is set to English, fill in 'Move', etc.). 6. Source Path: Optional: The path to the source file(s) or folder(s) for the task. If left blank, the task can only be executed by dragging and dropping into the window or by using the right-click context menu. (Path format example: D:\db\test) 7. Target Path: Required, the target file/folder path for the task. (Path format: D:\db\test)
